messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

re notification oracle fusion post upgrade issues resolved re notification fusion post upgrade issues resolved hi still have issues connecting using sign using sign after typing credentials logging get main with authentication failed error attached picture need complete preferably today regards sent thursday notification fusion post upgrade issues resolved importance high hello everyone please be advised previously reported issues related work schedule fixed you should be able submit your timecards if you were experience further issues please hesitate contact kind regards ext sent monday notification fusion post upgrade issues importance high hello everyone please be advised following fusion upgrade release some you experiencing errors related logging into application timecard work schedule we currently working resolve these issues we update you any relevant information available we apologize for any have caused thank you for your understanding kind regards ext

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Tickets**

I need to classify an IT ticket into the right category from the list: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, and Administrative Rights. The ticket discusses issues related to Oracle Fusion post-upgrade, specifically login and authentication errors. There are also references to timecard submissions, but it mainly revolves around access problems. So, I think the most fitting category here is "Access." This seems pretty clear-cut!{"category":"Access"}
